item.title: Need help (wild zones)
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

ok when i go into my client.java i will then search for insafezone.
when it birngs up my safe zones i will add an area to make it safe.
but when i’m in the area it say’s it is a pk zone.

how do i make it safe.

public boolean inSafezone() { // by Mod Adam if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2800 && absX <=2820 && absY >=3330 && absY <=3334 ) || (absX >=3633 && absX <=3715 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3550 ) || (absX >=2600 && absX <=2750 && absY >=9300 && absY <=9600 ) || (absX >=3150 && absX <=3192 && absY >=2958 && absY <=2999 ) || (absX >=2844 && absX <=2865 && absY >=3329 && absY <=3332 ) || (absX >=2638 && absX <=2661 && absY >=3353 && absY <=3381 ) || (absX >=2824 && absX <=2843 && absY >=3329 && absY <=3337 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2634 && absY >=3393 && absY <=3447 ) || (absX >=2688 && absX <=2718 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3468 ) || (absX >=2869 && absX <=2878 && absY >=3332 && absY <=3341 ) || (absX >=2806 && absX <=2868 && absY >=3333 && absY <=3368 ) || (absX >=3091 && absX <=3098 && absY >=3489 && absY <=3499 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >= 2578 && absX <=2609 && absY >=3150 && absY <=3175 ) || (absX >=2630 && absX <=2680 && absY >=2630 && absY <=2690 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 ) || (absX >=3247 && absX <=3261 && absY >=3430 && absY <=3440 ) || (absX >=3206 && absX <=3177 && absY >=3437 && absY <=3422 ) || (absX >=3182 && absX <=3290 && absY >=3507 && absY <=3381 ) || (absX >=2701 && absX <=2698 && absY >=3330 && absY <=3328 ) || (absX >=2606 && absX <=2607 && absY >=3103 && absY <=3100 )) return true; else return false; }
